reviewText: My daughters have watched quite often since I bought it.  The product was in perfect condition when it was arrived.

My daughter loves the music.  She sings and dances to it in addition to knowing all of the words of the episode.  And of course she learns Spanish words from Dora as always.  Dora and Boots find a lost butterfly and together with Diego and friends take the butterfly to the butterfly ball in the sky earning wings.  Cute.
She liked it and it kept her well entertained.  Not really a favorite of hers but she's into superheroes anyways.  I was surprised she picked this but she does like Dora.
My daughter loves Dora and bought this with her own money. I'm not a huge fan, but it's clean and my daughter is entertained.
My 2 year old granddaughter loves this video. That's all that matters. She loves the songs and characters. Great for when Dora is not on T.V.
I boought this for my four year old granddaughter who is in  love with Dora.  She has it played over and over.  It is a nice little movie for the younger set.
This is a video for the Dora fans out there.  It's upbeat and the ball is just fun to watch.
My 3 yr old daughter loves Dora and when she saw this movie sitting on the table for her, she was super excited. She loves it!!

This DVD features 3 Dora episodes for an hour of explorer-fun.  The first episode is "The Butterfly Ball" which is about Dora and her friends helping the butterflies and then everyone getting wings.  My boys asked if they could go there and get wings!  The other two episodes are not necessarily about butterflies but still Dora.  One of them is about Father's Day and my boys kept asking about that!  While Dora is not my favorite to watch, it really is an educational show and my kids love to interact with it.  I will say too the quality of the episodes is great and I guess I haven't watched any current Dora episodes, but these episodes are pretty good animation. This would be a perfect Easter gift!

I received this DVD to review in exchange for my honest opinion.
Goddaughter enjoy Dora so much she get very excited
I can always count on Dora for quality educational needs for my grand children.
